charges.charge_description: Ct. 1: Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute more than 100 kilograms of marihuana; 21 USC 846, 841(a)(1), and 841(b)(1)(B)(1)
Ct. 2: Possession with intent to distribute more than 100 kilograms, that is, approx. 114.97 kilos (253.46 pounds) of marihuana; 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and 18 USC 2(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 24 months BOP. 2 years SRT. Court waives Fine. Special Assessment $100.00 remitted.
